pullrequest.title: Handle authentication error connecting to lyse

content.raw:
Thanks for testing!

I’m not able to reproduce the problem. Is the BLACS computer on a new enough version of zprocess? 2.12.5 is required for ordinary zmq\_get calls to have the possibility of raising AuthenticationFailure - I only added that the other day and didn’t make anything depend on it since it’s not strictly required, so that might be why you’re not seeing it.

My test setup is the following, with a bit of hoop-jumping since I’m only on one computer:

* Comment out shared secret in labconfig
* kill zlock and zlog if running
* start lyse
* Kill the unencrypted zlock and zlog servers that lyse started
* Uncomment shared secret
* Start BLACS
* See authentication failure message in tooltip

Same thing happens if I have lyse be the encrypted one and BLACS be the unencrypted one.
